data.text: @LucyMcGetts The Fischer's do have a very good "laughing at other people's missfortune" face...especially when, I assume, that one of us has polished off most of that bottle of wine on the table!
@JezFischer 😭😭 It’s actually Krista’s face in the picture we enjoyed the most!

@LucyMcGetts They messaged me before you'd even said you couldn't make it, begging me to replace you. I said no, naturally...didn't want to ruin every future dinner with looking across at you, wishing it was me. (P.s. legit hope you feel better soon!! X)
